p: 2.5 mg of (S)-(âˆ’)-citronellic acid in 0.5 mL of methylene chloride was treated at r.t. with a soln. of 0.5 mL of CH 2N 2 in the ether prepared above. The soln. was placed in a laboratory fume hood overnight to complete the reaction, allowed for evaporation of solvent and CH 2N 2, and the sample was then redissolved in Et 2O for GC analysis.
